patterns: I want to hear a joke
responses: Why don't skeletons fight each other? They don't have the guts.
What do you call fake spaghetti? An impasta!
Why did the bicycle fall over? It was two-tired.
Why did the chicken cross the road? To get to the other side!
What do you get when you cross a snowman with a vampire? Frostbite.
Here's another one: Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!
How about this: What's orange and sounds like a parrot? A carrot!
Here's a good one: Why don't some couples go to the gym? Because some relationships don't work out.
